pageContext.claim: “We have 43 million masks, which is far more than anyone would have assumed we could have had so quickly, and a lot more are coming.”
pageContext.analysis: Just two weeks later, after the number of covid-19 cases suddenly spike, The Washington Post headlined an article: "Shortages of face masks, swabs and basic supplies pose a new challenge to coronavirus testing." The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention attempted to address the mask shortage by recommending the use of bandannas, if necessary, the article said.
